isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: Use with Circuit Diagram Book CTS-5122W.

svcproc.title: Air Suspension With Air or Hydraulic Brakes
svcproc.para: If the vehicle is equipped with air brakes, the air suspension uses the same air supply and low air alarm system. If the vehicle is equipped with hydraulic brakes, then there is a small engine driven air pump and a low pressure alarm for air suspension. If pressure drops below 70 PSI, the low air pressure alarm will sound and the warning light will turn on.
